title: CSC 101 - Introduction to Computer Science
content:
Course: CSC 101 - Introduction to Computer Science

Units: 3

Description: Introduction to fundamental concepts of computer science. Problem-solving techniques, algorithm development, and programming fundamentals.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 101

title: CSC 210 - Programming Principles
content:
Course: CSC 210 - Programming Principles

Units: 3

Description: Object-oriented programming, data structures, algorithm design, and software development practices.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 210

title: CSC 220 - Data Structures
content:
Course: CSC 220 - Data Structures

Units: 3

Description: Advanced data structures including linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, hash tables, and their implementations.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 220

title: CSC 230 - Discrete Mathematical Structures for Computer Science
content:
Course: CSC 230 - Discrete Mathematical Structures for Computer Science

Units: 3

Description: Discrete mathematics for computer science including logic, sets, functions, relations, combinatorics, and graph theory.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 230

title: CSC 256 - Introduction to Algorithm Analysis and Design
content:
Course: CSC 256 - Introduction to Algorithm Analysis and Design

Units: 3

Description: Algorithm design techniques, complexity analysis, sorting, searching, and algorithmic problem-solving.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 256

title: CSC 317 - Web Software Development
content:
Course: CSC 317 - Web Software Development

Units: 3

Description: Full-stack web application development using modern frameworks, databases, and cloud technologies.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 317

title: CSC 340 - Programming Methodology
content:
Course: CSC 340 - Programming Methodology

Units: 3

Description: Software development methodologies, design patterns, testing, version control, and team collaboration.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 340

title: CSC 413 - Software Development
content:
Course: CSC 413 - Software Development

Units: 3

Description: Software engineering principles, agile methodologies, project management, and full-cycle development.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 413

title: CSC 415 - Operating Systems Principles
content:
Course: CSC 415 - Operating Systems Principles

Units: 3

Description: Operating system concepts: processes, threads, scheduling, memory management, file systems, and synchronization.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 415

title: CSC 510 - Analysis of Algorithms I
content:
Course: CSC 510 - Analysis of Algorithms I

Units: 3

Description: Advanced algorithm design and analysis, complexity theory, NP-completeness, and optimization techniques.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Undergraduate
Course Code: CSC 510

title: CSC 600 - Advanced Topics in Computer Science
content:
Course: CSC 600 - Advanced Topics in Computer Science

Units: 3

Description: Graduate-level seminar covering current research topics in computer science.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Graduate
Course Code: CSC 600

title: CSC 645 - Computer Networks
content:
Course: CSC 645 - Computer Networks

Units: 3

Description: Network protocols, architecture, TCP/IP, routing, network security, and distributed systems.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Graduate
Course Code: CSC 645

title: CSC 667 - Advanced Database Management Systems
content:
Course: CSC 667 - Advanced Database Management Systems

Units: 3

Description: Advanced database concepts, query optimization, transaction processing, distributed databases.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Graduate
Course Code: CSC 667

title: CSC 690 - Master's Project
content:
Course: CSC 690 - Master's Project

Units: 3

Description: Individual research project under faculty supervision culminating in written report and presentation.

Department: Computer Science
Level: Graduate
Course Code: CSC 690
